Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.hardtoken

Interface HardTokenSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HardTokenSessionLocal, HardTokenSessionRemote
    public interface HardTokenSession
    Session bean for managing hard tokens, hard token profiles and hard token issuers. A hard token is a smart card, usb token and similar. A generic thing actually.
    Version:
    $Id: HardTokenSession.java 19902 2014-09-30 14:32:24Z anatom $

      • isAuthorizedToEditHardTokenIssuer

        boolean isAuthorizedToEditHardTokenIssuer​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken token,
                                          String alias)
        Checks if the provided token is authorized to the issuer identified by the alias, and if she is authorized to edit hard token issuers.
        Parameters:
        token - An AuthenticationToken
        alias - The alias of the hard token being checked against
        Returns:
        true if the token is authorized to edit the issuer identified by the alias.

        Parameters:

        alias - alias of hardtoken issuer.
        Returns:

      • getIsHardTokenProfileAvailableToIssuer

        void getIsHardTokenProfileAvailableToIssuer​(int issuerid,
                                            org.cesecore.certificates.endentity.EndEntityInformation userdata)
                                     throws org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.UnavailableTokenException
        Checks if a hard token profile is among a hard tokens issuers available token types.
        Parameters:
        issuerid - the id of the issuer to check.
        userdata - the data of user about to be generated
        Throws:
        org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.UnavailableTokenException - if users tokentype isn't among hard token issuers available tokentypes.

      • addHardToken

        void addHardToken​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                  String tokensn,
                  String username,
                  String significantissuerdn,
                  int tokentype,
                  org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.types.HardToken hardtokendata,
                  Collection<Certificate> certificates,
                  String copyof)
           throws org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenExistsException
        Adds a hard token to the database
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator calling the function
        tokensn - The serial number of token.
        username - the user owning the token.
        significantissuerdn - indicates which CA the hard token should belong to.
        tokentype - tyype
        hardtokendata - the hard token data
        certificates - a collection of certificates places in the hard token
        copyof - indicates if the newly created token is a copy of an existing token. Use null if token is an original.
        Throws:
        org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenExistsException - if tokensn already exists in database.

      • changeHardToken

        void changeHardToken​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                     String tokensn,
                     int tokentype,
                     org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.types.HardToken hardtokendata)
              throws org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenDoesntExistsException
        Changes a hard token data in the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator calling the function
        tokensn - The serial number of token.
        tokentype - type
        hardtokendata - the hard token data
        Throws:
        org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenDoesntExistsException - if tokensn does not exist in database.

      • removeHardToken

        void removeHardToken​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                     String tokensn)
              throws org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenDoesntExistsException
        Removes a hard token data from the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator calling the function
        tokensn - The serial number of token.
        Throws:
        org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenDoesntExistsException - if tokensn does not exist in database.

      • existsHardToken

        boolean existsHardToken​(String tokensn)
        Checks if a hard token serial number exists in the database
        Parameters:
        tokensn - The serial number of token.
        Returns:
        true if it exists or false otherwise.

      • getHardToken

        org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenInformation getHardToken​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                                 String tokensn,
                                                                 boolean includePUK)
                                                          throws org.cesecore.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException
        Returns hard token data for the specified tokensn.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator calling the function
        tokensn - The serial number of token.
        includePUK - puk
        Returns:
        the hard token data or null if tokensn does not exist in database.
        Throws:
        org.cesecore.authorization.AuthorizationDeniedException - fail

      • getHardTokens

        Collection<org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.HardTokenInformation> getHardTokens​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                                              String username,
                                                                              boolean includePUK)
        Returns hard token data for the specified user.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator calling the function
        username - The username owning the tokens.
        includePUK - puk
        Returns:
        a Collection of all hard token user data.

      • matchHardTokenByTokenSerialNumber

        Collection<String> matchHardTokenByTokenSerialNumber​(String searchpattern)
        Method that searches the database for a tokensn. It returns all HardTokens with a serial number that begins with the given search-pattern.
        Parameters:
        searchpattern - of beginning of hard token sn
        Returns:
        a Collection of username(String) matching the search string

      • addHardTokenCertificateMapping

        void addHardTokenCertificateMapping​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                                    String tokensn,
                                    Certificate certificate)
        Adds a mapping between a hard token and a certificate.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator calling the function
        tokensn - The serialnumber of token.
        certificate - the certificate to map to.

      • removeHardTokenCertificateMapping

        void removeHardTokenCertificateMapping​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                                       Certificate certificate)
        Removes a mapping between a hard token and a certificate.
        Parameters:
        admin - the administrator calling the function
        certificate - the certificate to map to.

      • findCertificatesInHardToken

        Collection<Certificate> findCertificatesInHardToken​(String tokensn)
        Returns all the X509Certificates places in a hard token.
        Parameters:
        tokensn - The serialnumber of token.
        Returns:
        a collection of X509Certificates

      • findHardTokenByCertificateSNIssuerDN

        String findHardTokenByCertificateSNIssuerDN​(BigInteger certificatesn,
                                            String issuerdn)
        Returns the tokensn that belongs to a given certificatesn and tokensn.
        Parameters:
        certificatesn - The serial number of certificate.
        issuerdn - the issuerdn of the certificate.
        Returns:
        the serial number or null if no tokensn could be found.

      • tokenGenerated

        void tokenGenerated​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                    String tokensn,
                    String username,
                    String significantissuerdn)
        Method used to signal to the log that token was generated successfully.
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing action
        tokensn - tokensn of token generated
        username - username of user token was generated for.
        significantissuerdn - indicates which CA the hard token should belong to.

      • errorWhenGeneratingToken

        void errorWhenGeneratingToken​(org.cesecore.authentication.tokens.AuthenticationToken admin,
                              String tokensn,
                              String username,
                              String significantissuerdn)
        Method used to signal to the log that error occurred when generating token.
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing action
        tokensn - tokensn of token.
        username - username of user token was generated for.
        significantissuerdn - indicates which CA the hard token should belong to.

      • getHardTokenProfileUsingCertificateProfile

        List<String> getHardTokenProfileUsingCertificateProfile​(int certificateProfileId)
        Method to check if a certificate profile exists in any of the hard token profiles. Used to avoid desynchronization of certificate profile data.
        Parameters:
        certificateProfileId - the CertificateProfile id to search for.
        Returns:
        a List of hard token profile names

      • existsHardTokenProfileInHardTokenIssuer

        boolean existsHardTokenProfileInHardTokenIssuer​(int id)
        Method to check if a hard token profile exists in any of the hard token issuers. Used to avoid desynchronization of hard token profile data.
        Parameters:
        id - the hard token profile id to search for.
        Returns:
        true if hard token profile id exists in any of the hard token issuers.
